description: Client Management Platform offers a window of data and analytics for insurance clients. Cigna agents organize graphs and charts on a dashboard to best summarize the savings that clients enjoy by changing the plans they provide to their employees. These dashboard tiles are exported and archived as powerpoint and PDF documents for client meetings and reference.
workItems: Lead design and development of end-to-end features: database design (RDS, Postgres, S3; REST API (API Gateway, Lambda, Python, & NodeJS); front-end (Angular 11+).
Improved team output by 25% by teaching junior members of the team parts of the stack.
Developed Jenkins CI/CD pipelines for continuous integration and automated deployments.
keyActivities: Planned Features and Stories, in JIRA using Agile SDLC.
Designed database tables and enhanced query performance in AWS RDS + PostgreSQL.
Developed business logic in NodeJS, TypeScript, ExpressJS on AWS Lambda + API Gateway.
Created UI/UX components and workflows in Sketch and developed customer experiences in Angular 11+.
accomplishments: Refactored legacy monolithic applications into microservices, resulting in 1000x in performance improvements.
Scaled frontend applications in Kubernetes, handling thousands of concurrent users in production.
Secured customer data and user operations by developing a security system based on user's permissions.
